short_summary: The Department of National Defence is seeking the items detailed below.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
full_summary:
### Fundamental Notice: Request for Proposal - NSN 01-2578666, SOLENOID VALVE (W8482-230976/A)

#### Contract Information:

* **PRISM Contract ID**: PW-22-01012999
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-230976/A
* **Publication Date**: November 9, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 20, 2022 (14:00 Eastern Time)
* **Amendment Date**: December 16, 2022
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of National Defence
* **End User**: Department of National Defence

#### Key Details:

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia and Nova Scotia
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Tender Description:
The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for solenoid valves as per the following specifications:
* **Item 1**: GSIN: N4810, NSN: 01-2578666, VALVE, SOLENOID
	+ Quantity: 16 units
	+ Delivery location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* **Item 2**: GSIN: N4810, NSN: 01-2578666, VALVE, SOLENOID
	+ Quantity: 10 units
	+ Delivery location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

Bidders are required to submit prices in Canadian dollars. Equivalent or substitute products must be clearly indicated. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. 

#### Additional Documents:
 Provideance is made available for download at the following link: 
 * English [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/09/0d9c242963e17439b3cd893187d6ad0f/w8482-230976_-_english_rfp.pdf   ](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/09/0d9c242963e17439b3
